source: Do you want to cancel character creation?
Are you sure you want to cancel the character level-up process?
The item "{0}" is no longer attuned.
Are you sure you want to remove attunement to this item?
This item is currently attuned to {0}. Are you sure you want to attune it to {1}?
Are you sure you want to delete this character? This action cannot be undone.
Casting the {0} spell will make you lose concentration on the {1} spell. Are you sure you want to proceed?
Are you sure you want to abort this craft operation? All progress and spent ingredients will be lost.
Are you sure you want to fast travel to this destination? (Time will be fast-forwarded accordingly.)
You cannot fast travel to this destination as the path is blocked.
Are you sure you wish to fast travel to this exit and leave the area? (Time will be fast-forwarded accordingly.)
The item identification has been canceled.
You have not prepared all the spells you can. Are you sure you want to continue?
Items on the ground will be lost if you leave this screen. Are you sure you wish to proceed?
Since you have not agreed with these terms, the application will now quit.
You are about to leave the current area. Proceed?
Do you want to resume camping?
Do you want to continue your long rest?
Are you sure you want to permanently delete saved game "{0}"?
Are you sure you want to overwrite saved game "{0}" with your current game status?
Scribing the spell into the selected spellbook will destroy the scroll. Are you sure you want to proceed?
Are you sure you want to leave the setup of this new adventure?
Are you sure you want to keep the selected settings changes?
Are you sure you want to close this panel and discard all the changes you have made?
You have not completed the level up sequence for {0}. Are you sure you want to exit?
You have already performed a long rest today. Would you like to wait until the start of a new day?
Waiting to Perform a Long Rest
You have reached the end of the Early Access playable content. You will now return to the main menu.
The {0} key is already bound to the {1} command
Are you sure you want to reset to the default values for this category of settings?
You need to restart the application to apply this change
The {0} spell is already in this spellbook
This will revert all custom settings you may have tuned in the Game Settings menu. Do you wish to continue?
Could not connect to the Steam client. Please ensure that you launch the game via Steam. A Steam Client restart may be required. The game will now exit.
The game was not exited properly. If you are seeing this message for the first time, we recommend that you lower the graphics settings and report this to our team in the forum.
You have reached the end of the Early Access. The main story cannot be played any further, but you can travel around, collect stuff, and complete optional quests.
Travel aborted. The party will stop at the next location.
Some character files have not been updated. Are you sure you wish to continue?
You have been signed out of Xbox Live. The game will now close. [Please reconnect to Xbox Live and start the game again.]
There was an error saving your content to the cloud servers. [Please try again later.]
There was an error deleting your content from the cloud servers. [Please try again later.]
Are you sure you want to delete this user location?
Saving this location with this name will overwrite another location with the same name. Are you sure you want to proceed?
Are you sure you want to leave without saving your location?
The target entrance index is invalid: {0}
Reducing the size of this location may destroy some rooms and props, starting from the top right. Are you sure you want to proceed?
One or more locations has outdated content (room, gadget, prop) which has been removed
Changing the location of this environment will remove some incompatible rooms, props, and/or gadgets. Are you sure you want to proceed?
You must enter a valid title for your user location
The location "{0}" has unsaved changes. Are you sure you want to open the location "{1}" and lose these changes?
A location bearing the same name already exists
Are you sure you want to delete this user campaign?
Saving this campaign with this name will overwrite another campaign with the same name. Are you sure you want to proceed?
You are about to lose the changes to this campaign. Are you sure you want to proceed?
The game cannot be saved at the moment and some progress may be lost. Quit anyway?
